column5: Ok, not to bash Charlie Moore but that other thread got me thinking.  So... I have only been fishing (again as I took many years off) for a few years and only went after bass but looking to expand on that.  My thoughts are, would you rather watch someone one like me go throught the learning process of how to fish and the same process of what to fish for OR a show like Charlie Moore?  If for some reason people want to see me then I'm going to need some help from the good folks that make these shows now.  I'm not asking so I have a glimmer of hope at a show but because we all say "I can make a better show then that!" regarding any show.  I am very intersted to see this poll too...  Cheers!  Geoff
Never seen him.  Never seen you.    You win.
Geoff and there better be lots of bloopers like bill dance
if I had a show, YOU BET!  But it does make me cring at the thought of just how many hooks I would end up with in me and lost itmes.  But hey, sure is worth a try if someone is willing to back me!
You Geoff. Moore is a Moore-on. And Jose, Bill Dance is hilarious.  Curt
Thanks Curt.  If there are enough votes, how would I take this to WFN?  I'm not looking for a show but proof people want what people want, not what we are "fed"
LOL, 8 for me 1 for him, THANKS FOLKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Not too bash you but you should have offered another option...None of the above.  There are way too many fishing on the tube now.

well I hate most fishing shows now- really liked the old In-fisherman! I have been shooting some short vid clips the last few seasons- my daughter is taking film media in school so I will be coercing her into going on some day trips with me and shooting my day, I can edit etc on Mac at home. even if no-one but myself watches 'em- they will still be better than most. I can't stand watching the whole damn fight of a fish- rig up, present, hook-set, land it, release it- simple! Keep talking to a minimum while holding fish out of water!!!!
I could but where would the fun be for me in that?  There will be no GBW fishing show as I cannot afford to do one.  But if I ever did it would be like the now gone Urban Outdoor Adventures...
